TCL 50 ESE GWO 25 SSW GLH 20 NNW LLQ 35 E LIT 30 N MEM 50 NNW MSL 20
SE MSL 35 N TCL.

EWN 45 N CHS 35 WSW VDI 30 WSW MAI 25 WNW DHN 25 S CSG 25 NNW MCN 25
S CLT 15 W RDU 10 WSW RZZ 20 W ECG 35 NW HSE 25 ESE EWN.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 50 WSW BNA HSV 25 NE
TCL 40 NNW MEI 45 ENE MLU 30 W LLQ 20 NNE LIT 35 E JBR 50 WSW BNA
...CONT... 75 S PNS 25 S GZH 30 SW TOI 10 SSE AHN 25 NE CLT 30 WSW
